item.title: As a Docker Desktop Extension
item.description: This guide shows you how to install Microcks as a Docker Desktop Extension on your local machine.

item.title: With Docker Compose
item.description: This guide shows you how to install and run Microcks using Docker Compose.

item.description: This guide shows you how to install and run Microcks using Docker Compose.

item.title: On Kind with Helm
item.description: Overview This guide will walk you through the different steps of running a full Microcks installation on your laptop using Kind.

item.description: Overview This guide will walk you through the different steps of running a full Microcks installation on your laptop using Minikube.

item.title: Adding external dependencies
item.description: Overview This guide is a walkthrough, that exposes Microcks extension capabilities and explain how to leverage them.
